titlestmt.titleproper: Births, death, marriage records within area of Philadelphia Yearly Meeting
Compiled birth, death, marriage records within the area of Philadelphia Yearly Meeting SFHL.SC.289
titlestmt.author: Susanna Morkawa

publicationstmt.publisher: Friends Historical Library of Swarthmore College

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-05-14 14:14:35 -0400.

repository.corpname: Friends Historical Library of Swarthmore College

did.unittitle: Compiled birth, death, marriage records within the area of Philadelphia Yearly Meeting
did.abstract: This small collection is composed of notebooks containing announcements and records of births, death, marriage of individuals living within the area of Philadelphia Yearly Meeting, many living in Bucks County, Pennsylvania. Not all were members of the Society of Friends, and the sources are not included.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains notebooks containing handwritten copies of the announcement and records of births, death, marriage of individuals living within the area of Philadelphia Yearly Meeting. Many are inviduals living in Bucks County, Pennsylvania. Not all were members of the Society of Friends.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Transferred from Meeting Papers, Miscellaneous Manuscripts, when that artificial collections was reviewed in 2018.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Friends Historical Library believes all of the items in this collection to be in the Public Domain in the United States, and is not aware of any restrictions on their use. However, the user is responsible for making a final determination of copyright status before reproducing. See http://rightsstatements.org/vocab/NoC-US/1.0/.
